titles.title: INFORM Act

To amend title 49, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to establish a database of exemptions for motor vehicles from the Federal motor vehicle safety standards, and for other purposes.
Increasing Information and Notification to Foster Openness Regarding Highly Automated Vehicle Matters to States Act
INFORM Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Digital Commerce and Consumer Protection.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary:
Increasing Information and Notification to Foster Openness Regarding Highly Automated Vehicle Matters to States Act or the INFORM Act
This bill requires the Department of Transportation to establish a publicly available electronic database of exemptions from motor vehicle safety or bumper standards.
